aboutMe.text1: I am Jethro Muluba, a passionate full stack web and mobile developer dedicated to creating innovative solutions to achieve ambitious goals. With expertise in UI/UX design, I transform ideas into intuitive and engaging user experiences.
aboutMe.text2: My background as an instructor and my ability to set realistic goals allow me to manage complex projects and solve problems efficiently.

services.underTitle: I offer a comprehensive range of services to meet your digital needs :

services.title: UX & UI Design
services.description: Creating intuitive and aesthetic designs for exceptional user experiences.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building high-performance and responsive websites using the latest technologies.

services.title: App Design
services.description: Designing user-friendly and engaging mobile applications.

services.title: App Development
services.description: Developing robust web and mobile applications with a focus on performance and security.

workExperiences.underTitle: I have built a diverse and dynamic career in the tech industry. Here are some of my key professional experiences:

experiences.description: Developing and maintaining user interfaces for web applications using React and Tailwind CSS.
Creating web and mobile application mockups, focusing on ergonomics and user experience.
